section.title: ResizeMove
section.para:
This command does the same as the
and
commands, but in a single call which is less visually disturbing. The resize-arguments are exactly the same arguments as for the
command and the move-arguments are exactly the same arguments as for the
command except the pointer option which is not supported by the ResizeMove command.
section.programlisting:
# window to top left corner and cover # most of the screen ResizeMove -10p -20p 0 0
# Grow the focused window towards the top of screen keep w+$[w.y]p keep 0
section.para:
Note: Fvwm may not be able to parse the command properly if the option bottomright of the
command is used.
